alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 16 at 6:58PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA...CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...AND WYOMING COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue to impact southern Erie and Wyoming counties, and also much of the Lake Erie shore from Hamburg to Ripley, and inland across the Chautauqua Ridge. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in the most intense portions of this band. Travel conditions will continue to deteriorate this evening, with very poor visibility and snow covered, slippery roads. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Perry, Warsaw, Colden, Orchard Park, Westfield, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Angola, Arcade, Mayville, North Collins and Long Point State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 6. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
